website_summaries.verdict: Best for larger plants and shrubs. If you can get over the fish smell, it's an incredibly effective product.
pros: Stands at the top of the our list for being affordable, effective and fast
It's concentrated, and owners rave about results such as 2-day germination and lush foliage
Effective for most plants and won't cause burns
cons: It's somewhat smelly, but the natural wintergreen oil additive helps keep the odor in check

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 30 yrs I just bought some because it is time to feed my houseplants They are making this so watery that one container is only going to last for about a month I feed them every other week Do yourself a favor find another brand that is more thicker This stuff used to be so thick and last a lot longer
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Gullotto

customer_reviews.title: Busted open in package
customer_reviews.text: My product was busted open so I lost about half of one bottle, which was disappointing. Other than that, can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: celia

customer_reviews.title: Works on my Vegetable Plants
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fertilizer initially for my watermelon plants and realized it was a good match for all of my plants and vegetables. The price is a little high as I found it much cheaper at a local BM store. I will keep this purchase because it seems to be compatible with all of my plants indoor and outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: GAShopr65

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cure all!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like dead fish but works like a miracle...I put this on everything including my house plants twice a year and that’s all you need cause this stuff works. It brought a dying tree back to life in 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Javin

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Will know results in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and well packaged. Used one bottle on my garden. Not sure that it smelled as strong as other fish fertilizers I have used. Does smell coincide with strength/potency? Perhaps someone from Lilly Miller can answer that question.
customer_reviews.author: Harllie12

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Product is great used for years, first time ordering it on amazone 1 bottle came damaged what a stincky mess
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Came severely damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Product came destroyed and my lord it stinks! Both bottles were damaged. Use a different vendor for this product that provides quality shipping material
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: thank you for this product! it works! stinky is good sign!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Yes it smells, but what else would you expect with a fish based fertilizer? Worked well for my climbing roses.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but good.
customer_reviews.text: Great for making compost tea and starting young plants 🌱.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Slim

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: please use on your veggies - the best for produce
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best fertilizer you can use for your plants.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the smell but it is fish poop. My mother had a green thumb and she always used fish emulsion for fertilizer. She had the most beautiful flowers in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Well-fed veggies
customer_reviews.text: My vegetables seem to respond well after two weeks of treatment with the product. It is predictably fishy-smelling and you will be too after mixing it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Mansager

customer_reviews.title: Good fertilizer HORRIBLE packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Love this to use in garden and flower bed. Shipping needs improvement one bottle had a busted bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Alaska Fish Fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: The product works...but the smell of the product is strong. But other than that, it does work. Follow the instructions on the back of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Product says 2 pack, but only one was delivered. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: The product really works.
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is the smell. I order it for roses but it brought my hosta plants back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarene Burris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... minus one of my bottle being sliced and leaked.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. However, I didn't appreciate that one of my bottles had a slice in it and leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Oni N Oga

customer_reviews.title: Plants love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product but smells horrible. Wish I had used earlier in the growing season.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing Cannabis
customer_reviews.text: My plants are almost tree size, in just 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Farivar

customer_reviews.title: Came early than scheduled
customer_reviews.text: 1 bottle has a leak, liquid spilled in the plastic and box
customer_reviews.author: Romma17

customer_reviews.title: Good fertilizer, STRONG ODOR
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my outdoor potted plants and it works well. I can't imagine using it indoors due to it's STRONG odor. NO fish smell, but a powerful waste smell...which essentially it is...fish processing waste. Also, the bottles i have contain a thick syrup which can be harder to work with while measuring/pouring, especially in smaller quantities. It's good stuff but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: J-

customer_reviews.title: expensive on amazon
customer_reviews.text: you can get a gallon of this at home depot for 23$
customer_reviews.author: miguel galceran
